definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing

sentences.english: It’s not appropriate to leave queues of taxpayers and go for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 放下排长队的纳税人去吃午饭这实在是不怎么合适。

sentences.english: The plan does, however, depend on American taxpayers stumping up huge amounts of money.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这项计划需要依靠纳税人的钱来保证所需巨资。

sentences.english: Forget about throwing billions more of taxpayer money at Motown.
sentences.chinese: 别再打算拿几十亿纳税人血汗钱往汽车城打水漂了。

sentences.english: Taxpayers are grumbling about the waste of government money,as usual.
sentences.chinese: 纳税人又像往常一样抱怨政府浪费钱财。

sentences.english: Impartially enforcing the law and effectively safeguarding the legitimate rights and interests of taxpayers.
sentences.chinese: 秉公执法，切实维护纳税人的合法权益。

sentences.english: There will be no US taxpayer dollars used to prop-up GM's vast overseas network.
sentences.chinese: 美国纳税人不会用来支撑通用公司的巨大海外网络。

sentences.english: We don't need British tax-payers money as aid.
sentences.chinese: 我们不需要英国纳税人的钱来作为资助。

sentences.english: I think taxpayers wont mind spending on R&D works that DRDO takes up.
sentences.chinese: 我想纳税人不会在意DRDO进行的研发工作花钱。

sentences.english: So today, we're announcing the first-ever federal taxpayer receipt.
sentences.chinese: 所以，今天我们发布了首份联邦纳税人税收收据。

sentences.english: Taxpayers will likely lose more than $2,000,000,000 in federal rescue money.
sentences.chinese: 而纳税人将在联邦救助资金里损失超过20亿美元。

sentences.english: Besides, taxpayers are usually surly-looking after waiting for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 另外，纳税人在漫长等待后常常脾气不好。

sentences.english: If the bail-outs are well handled, taxpayers could end up profiting from their reluctant investment in the banks.
sentences.chinese: 如果救助合理有效，纳税人就会从被迫的投资中受益。

sentences.english: Sale of goods or taxable services by small-scal e taxpayers.
sentences.chinese: 小规模纳税人销售货物或者应税劳务的。

sentences.english: This is unfair to taxpayers who conduct trade offline.
sentences.chinese: 这对进行线下贸易的纳税人是不公平的。

sentences.english: Taxpayer money would not be included in such a deal, they said.
sentences.chinese: 他们说，纳税人的钱是不会用在这个交易里的。

sentences.english: And it starts off with just 1% for 90% of the US tax payers.
sentences.chinese: 对于90%的美国纳税人来说。

definition: to file an income tax return/to declare dutiable goods (at customs)
personal income tax (abbr. for 個人所得稅|个人所得税)
to pay a tax one has evaded/to pay an overdue tax
